title: GFS site down?
content: The Greek Font Society page (at [www.greekfontsociety.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017110737/http:/www.greekfontsociety.org/ "www.greekfontsociety.org")) is currently pointing to a domain parking page. I hope this is only temporary!
author: metalfoot

comments.content: Oh crap. This is not good. Not good at all.

Good news. It's at [www.greekfontsociety.gr](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017110737/http:/www.greekfontsociety.gr/ "www.greekfontsociety.gr") now. Makes more sense for it to have a .gr domain anyway!
Their email still goes to the .org, at least that is what is suggested by what's on the homepage.

On the subject of GFS...I know that GFS Neohellenic has alternate versions of some letters, and I can see them in the Apple Character Palette on my Mac, but the typography panel in Cocoa applications doesn't seem to allow you to implement them. (E.g. it doesn't have a historical/archaic forms checkbox like, say, Palatino Linotype or Hoefler Text.) Is there any easy way to use the alternates on a Mac, or do you have to go the Character Palette every time?
